title: Should not fill cache when backup rawkv
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
v6.1.0 & master

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
1. run backup raw command
2. rocksdb block cache has much add operations.

### What did you expect?

backup should not fill block cache as it may evict cached data of user read. 

### What did happened?
